item.title: new post with rmd
item.description: hello Context Here’s another quick post on the results of the recent general elections in Austria. It goes without saying that there has been already a flurry of analyses, visualisations etc on it and there is hardly much new to add. Nevertheless, below a few library(tidyverse) ## -- Attaching packages ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ tidyverse 1.2.1 -- ## v ggplot2 3.2.1.9000 v purrr 0.3.2 ## v tibble 2.1.3 v dplyr 0.8.3 ## v tidyr 1.
